sentences.sContent: We embarked at Liverpool for New York.
sentences.sCn: 我们在利物浦上船去纽约。

sentences.sContent: He hit his car that he lost in New York.
sentences.sContent_eng: He hit his car that he lost in New York.
sentences.sCn: 他无意中发现了他在纽约丢失的汽车。

sentences.sContent: The railroad connects two cities, namely, New York and Chicago.
sentences.sContent_eng: The railroad connects two cities, namely, New York and Chicago.
sentences.sCn: 这条铁路连接两个城市，即纽约与芝加哥。
